description: Provide up-to-date information about players, teams, and games for the NBA, NFL, and MLB. Query detailed sports data dynamically to enhance your applications or agents with real-time sports insights. Easily integrate with popular clients like Claude Desktop and LibreChat using your Balldontlie API key.

tools.name: get_teams
tools.description: Gets the list of team from one of the following leagues NBA (National Basketball Association), MLB (Major League Baseball), NFL (National Football League)

tools.name: get_players
tools.description: Gets the list of players from one of the following leagues NBA (National Basketball Association), MLB (Major League Baseball), NFL (National Football League)

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination, the value should be next_cursor from previous call of get_players tool, optional

lastName.description: Last name of the player to search for, optional

firstName.description: First name of the player to search for, optional

tools.name: get_games
tools.description: Gets the list of games from one of the following leagues NBA (National Basketball Association), MLB (Major League Baseball), NFL (National Football League)

dates.description: Get games for a range of dates, format: YYYY-MM-DD, optional

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination, the value should be next_cursor from previous call of get_games tool, optional

seasons.description: Get games for a specific season, format: YYYY, optional

teamIds.description: Get games for specific team IDs, optional

tools.name: get_game
tools.description: Get a specific game from one of the following leagues NBA (National Basketball Association), MLB (Major League Baseball), NFL (National Football League)

gameId.description: Game ID to get the game for, the value should be Game ID from previous call of get_games tool

balldontlieApiKey.description: API key for the Balldontlie service
